Weapons.description: Target +1d4 damage at the start of each of its turn; Can end it as an action with a DC 10 Dex check

Weapons.name: Holy Water
Weapons.description: Only does damage against fiends and undead; Comes in flasks

Weapons.name: Acid Splash
Weapons.description: Dex save, success - no damage; 1 or 2 creatures within 5 ft of each other (PHB 211)

Weapons.name: Chill Touch
Weapons.description: Target can't regain HP and undead dis. on attacks vs. me, until my next turn (PHB 221)

Weapons.description: Each d10 is a separate beam requiring separate rolls (PHB 237)

Weapons.name: Poison Spray
Weapons.description: Con save, success - no damage; 1 creature (PHB 266)

Weapons.name: Produce Flame
Weapons.description: 10-ft radius bright light and 10-ft radius dim light until thrown (PHB 269)

Weapons.name: Ray of Frost
Weapons.description: Target -10 ft speed until start of my next turn (PHB 271)

Weapons.name: Sacred Flame
Weapons.description: Dex save, no bonus from cover, success - no damage; 1 creature (PHB 272)

Weapons.name: Shillelagh
Weapons.description: Imbued club or quarterstaff; Counts as a magical weapon (PHB 275)

Weapons.name: Shocking Grasp
Weapons.description: Advantage if target is wearing metal armor, target cannot take reactions until its next turn (PHB 275)

Weapons.name: Vicious Mockery
Weapons.description: Wis save, success - no damage, fail - also disadv. on next attack roll in next turn; 1 creature (PHB 285)

Weapons.name: Breath Weapon
Weapons.description: Hits all in area; Dex save, success - half damage; Usable only once per short rest

Weapons.name: Polearm butt end
Weapons.description: As bonus action after taking an attack action with only a glaive, halberd, or quarterstaff

Weapons.name: Thorn Whip
Weapons.description: Melee spell attack, pull target 10 ft closer to me (PHB 282)

Weapons.name: Create Bonfire
Weapons.description: 5-ft cube; Dex save at casting or when moved into, success - no damage; Conc, 1 min (EE 16)

Weapons.name: Frostbite
Weapons.description: Con save, success - no damage, fail - also disadv. on next weapon attack roll in next turn; 1 creature (EE 18)

Weapons.name: Magic Stone
Weapons.description: Produces 3 stones that each can be thrown (60 ft) or hurled with a sling (120 ft) as a spell attack (EE 20)

Weapons.name: Thunderclap
Weapons.description: Con save, success - no damage; all creatures in area; audible in 100 ft (EE 22)

Weapons.name: Armor spikes
Weapons.description: Does 3 piercing damage when using your attack to grapple

Weapons.name: Radiant Sun Bolt
Weapons.description: If used in an Attack action, spend 1 ki point to use it twice as a bonus action

Weapons.name: Booming Blade
Weapons.description: First damage added to the attack; second to the target if it moves next round (SCAG 142)

Weapons.name: Green-Flame Blade
Weapons.description: First damage added to the attack; second to a target within 5 ft (SCAG 143)

Weapons.name: Lightning Lure
Weapons.description: Str save; success - nothing; fail - pulled 10 ft closer to me, only take damage if end within 5 ft of me (SCAG 143)

Weapons.name: Sword Burst
Weapons.description: Dex save, success - no damage; all creatures in range (SCAG 143)

Weapons.name: Yklwa
Weapons.description: Thrown

Weapons.name: Radiant Sun Bolt
Weapons.description: If used in an Attack action, spend 1 ki point to use it twice as a bonus action

Weapons.name: Frostbite
Weapons.description: Con save, success - no damage, fail - also disadv. on next weapon attack roll in next turn; 1 creature (XGtE 156)

Weapons.description: Produces 3 stones that each can be thrown (60 ft) or hurled with a sling (120 ft) as a spell attack (XGtE 160)

Weapons.name: Thunderclap
Weapons.description: Con save, success - no damage; all creatures in area; audible in 100 ft (XGtE 168)

Weapons.name: Word of Radiance
Weapons.description: Con save, success - no damage; Only chosen creatures I can see are affected (XGtE 171)

Weapons.name: Longtooth
Weapons.description: Only while shifted; Target up to my size is grappled

Weapons.name: Razorclaw
Weapons.description: Only while shifted, use instead of unarmed strike: Can use as bonus action; Finesse

Weapons.name: Horns
Weapons.description: Advantage on all checks made to shove a creature, but not to avoid being shoved myself
